qa_pairs.what is your pricing for mobile app deve: Our mobile app development pricing starts at $15,000 for basic apps and can range up to $50,000+ for complex enterprise applications. We offer free consultations to provide accurate quotes based on your specific requirements.
qa_pairs.how long does development take?: Android mobile app 1 month, iphone mobile app 1 month, website 2 weeks, web application depends on what you want and how the application is big
qa_pairs.do you offer maintenance?: yes, for the website we offer 3 months free maintenance and for the web app and mobile app 1 month free.
qa_pairs.can you tell me about the push notificat: Push Notification mobile app is an Android an iPhone app that helps to the business owners to communicate with their customers in real time.
